cover_letter: Dear Hiring Manager, I am excited to apply for the Senior Full Stack Developer position at TechCorp. With over 5 years of experience in full-stack development using React, Node.js, and Python, I believe I would be a great fit for your team. I have successfully led the development of scalable web applications and have experience mentoring junior developers. I am particularly drawn to your AI-powered enterprise solutions and would love to contribute to cutting-edge technology projects.
notes: Strong technical background, good cultural fit

cover_letter: I am applying for the DevOps Engineer position. While my primary experience is in full-stack development, I have extensive experience with Docker, AWS, and CI/CD pipelines. I have automated deployment processes and implemented monitoring solutions in my previous roles. I am eager to expand my DevOps skills and contribute to building robust cloud infrastructure.

I am interested in the Product Designer position. While my background is in development, I have a strong passion for user experience and have collaborated closely with designers throughout my career. I understand the technical constraints and can bridge the gap between design and implementation. I am excited about the opportunity to focus on creating user-centered product designs.

I am thrilled to apply for the Product Designer position. With over 6 years of experience in UX/UI design, I have led design teams and created intuitive digital experiences for multiple startups and established companies. I am proficient in Figma, Sketch, and user research methodologies. I am particularly excited about the opportunity to work on innovative product designs that solve real-world problems.

I am applying for the UX Researcher position. My experience in UX/UI design has given me a strong foundation in understanding user needs and behaviors. I have conducted user research studies and created user personas and journey maps. I am excited about the opportunity to focus specifically on research and provide data-driven insights that improve user experience.
notes: Good UX background, transitioning to research

cover_letter: I am interested in the Senior Business Consultant position. While my background is in design, I have strong analytical and problem-solving skills. I have worked with clients to understand their needs and develop solutions that meet their business objectives. I am excited about the opportunity to apply my strategic thinking and communication skills in a consulting role.

I am excited to apply for the AI/ML Engineer position. With a Master's degree in Computer Science and 4 years of experience in machine learning, I have developed and deployed predictive models and AI pipelines. I am proficient in Python, TensorFlow, and have experience with MLOps. I am particularly interested in working on cutting-edge AI technologies and scaling AI infrastructure.
notes: Perfect match for the role, excellent technical skills

cover_letter: I am applying for the Data Analyst position. While my primary experience is in machine learning, I have strong skills in data analysis, SQL, and statistical analysis. I have created data visualizations and dashboards to communicate complex findings to stakeholders. I am excited about the opportunity to focus on data analysis and provide actionable business insights.
notes: Candidate withdrew after receiving another offer
